## 챗GPT 데이터 사이언스 {.smaller}

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(gt)
library(gtExtras)
extrafont::loadfonts()

curriculum_raw <- read_excel(glue::glue("{here::here()}/data/건국대_커리큘럼.xlsx"))

curriculum <- curriculum_raw %>% 
  fill(everything(), .direction="down") %>% 
  mutate(날짜 = as.Date(날짜)) %>% 
  mutate(주차 = glue::glue("{주차} 주차"))

## 첫번째
curriculum_first <- curriculum %>% 
  filter(dplyr::row_number() <=10)

curriculum_first_gt <- curriculum_first %>%   
  gt(groupname_col = c("주차", "날짜")) %>% 
    cols_align(align = "center") %>% 
  opt_table_font(
    font = list(
      google_font(name = "Sunflower"),
      "NanumGothic"
    )
  ) %>% 
  gt_theme_pff() %>% 
  tab_style(
    style = list(
      "font-variant: small-caps;"
    ),
    locations = cells_body(columns = everything())
  ) %>% 
  tab_header(
    title =
      htmltools::tagList(
        htmltools::tags$div(
          style = htmltools::css(
            `text-align` = "center"
          ),
          htmltools::HTML(
            web_image("img/konkuk/tools.png")
          )
        ),
        htmltools::tags$div(
          htmltools::tags$strong("챗GPT 데이터 사이언스"),
          "전문교육과정"
        )
      )
  )

## 두번째
curriculum_second <- curriculum %>% 
  filter(dplyr::row_number() > 10)

curriculum_second_gt <- curriculum_second %>%   
  gt(groupname_col = c("주차", "날짜")) %>% 
    cols_align(align = "center") %>% 
  opt_table_font(
    font = list(
      google_font(name = "Sunflower"),
      "NanumGothic"
    )
  ) %>% 
  gt_theme_pff() %>% 
  tab_style(
    style = list(
      "font-variant: small-caps;"
    ),
    locations = cells_body(columns = everything())
  ) 

## 결합

listed_tables <- list(curriculum_first_gt, curriculum_second_gt)

gt_two_column_layout(listed_tables)

```
